extras.value: The VRE expiration date can either be extended or anticipated upon VRE Manager's request. Any of these requests will take one month to be carried out.

This work has received support from the BlueBRIDGE Project (European Unionâ€™s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme, Grant agreement No 675680) and is operated by the D4Science Infrastructure (D4Science.org).

result.title: Alieia Virtual Research Environment
result.author: Francesco Mangiacrapa

organization.name: bluebridgeproject
organization.description: This proposal intends to contribute addressing Blue Growth societal challenge by developing and deploying service-driven digital research environments, services and tools, that leveraging resources provided by existing EU and global computing and data e-infrastructures, support all phases of production of relevant information, from data collection, to integration and analysis, till publication of relevant ecosystem and socio-economical indicators.
organization.title: BlueBRIDGE Project
